Text: SoN have released a new patch for OOTP12. It's a global patch that should be able to patch any version of OOTP12 so you won't have to keep downloading the pre-patched exe file. Please switch over to it because as long as it works the normal full releases will be stopped. Leave any comments or questions in the comment section of that page. Here is the link - http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6858526
